attributes.action: ban the internet and destroy all computers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The internet, wondeful invention that it is, is incredibly distracting.  The undersigned would like to:

1) Ban the internet

2) Destroy all computers

The second point is designed to aid the first.

So anyway, let's get rid of the internet and get back to the days where people actually did stuff instead of messing around looking at lists such as 'the world's tallest celebrities'.

Ta.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
